WRITING.TEXT: Be sure to place the barbell on the right place and not on your neck. You need to put the barbell behind your neck in such a way that your traps flex. Might want to check a few videos before doing it. You can seriously injure yourself when pushing a lot of weight with the barbell on your neck bones.. you don't think much about this with the pillow.
TIL the eiffel tower is painted.
